subject: Display of Employee ID Cards & Cooperation with Security Guard
body: BCC: All ConcernsDear Team,This is a reminder that all employees are required to wear their employee ID cards visibly while on company premises at all times. This is a standard security protocol and is essential for ensuring a safe and secure work environment for everyone.Please cooperate fully if security guard asks to see your employee ID. It is part of their official job responsibilities to verify identification, and they are acting in the interest of everyone’s safety.We want to emphasize that no form of disrespect or misconduct towards the security staff will be tolerated under any circumstances.
